column3: ɔwo ahwehwɛ mo mu
Ɔwo etse m'adwen ase kɔ ekyirekyir."

column2: "Ɔwo epɛnsapɛnsa me nantsew na me nda mu
column3: Na inyim m'akwan nyinara mu yie."
Hwɛ

column2: "Ɔwo etwa ayer me wɔ m'ekyir na m'enyim
column3: Na edze wo nsa ato mo do."

column2: "Dɛm nyimdzee yi ɔyɛ me nwanwa dodow; Ɔkrɔn
column3: munntum menntse ase."

column2: "Henfa na mibefi wo sunsum enyim akɔ? Anaa henfa na mibefi w'enyim meguan akɔ?"

column3: ewɔ hɔ: Sɛ mekɛsɛw me kɛtɛ wɔ samanadze a
Na mutu kɛtsena po ekyirekyir hɔ a;"

column2: "Hɔ mpo wo nsa begya me kwan
column3: Na w'abanyimfa esuo mo mu."
Ampaara sum bɛkata mo do a
column5: adzesaa mpo bɛdan kan etwa mo ho ehyia;"

column3: Na adzesaa yɛ kann dɛ adzekyee: Sum na kan nyina yɛ wo adze kor."

column2: "Na ɔwo na ebɔɔ mo mu ndzɛmba nyina: Ɔwo na eween me wɔ me na n'awotoa mu."
"Medze ndaase bɛma wo; osiandɛ awanwakwan a ɔyɛ hu do na ayɛ me: Wo ndwuma yɛ nwanwa; Na me kra nyim ara yie."

column3: Ber a wɔyɛɛ me wɔ ehuntsae mu
column4: Na wɔween me nwanwa mu wɔ asaase ase noho noho no."

column2: "W'enyiwa hun me ber a meyɛ bɔgyatɔw nko no
column3: Na me mfafakuwa nyinara wɔakyerɛw no wɔ wo nwoma no mu
column4: Na nda dodow a wɔahyehyɛ ama me no
column5: Naaso na no mu biara nnyae mmbae."

column3: mbrɛ w'adwen dua som me bo so a! Mbrɛ no dodow ano dua dɔɔ so a!"
no dodow ano dɔɔ so sen anhwea: Minyan a
column4: meda ho wɔ wo nkyɛn ara."

column3: ampaara ɔwo boku emumuyɛfo: Dɛm ntsi hom bɔgyakafo
Na w'atamfo bɔ wo dzin gyangyan."
ana minnkyir hɔn a wokyir wo? Na mo werɛ nnhow hɔn a wɔsoɛr tsia wo no?"
pɛnsapɛnsa mo mu
column4: na hu m'akoma mu: Sɔ me hwɛ

column3: sɛ emumuyɛ kwan bi wɔ mo mu a
column4: Na gya me fa daa kwan no mu."
